verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> O give thanks לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD קִרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> call בִּשְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> make known בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> among the people עֲלִילוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5949><s%> his deeds

שִֽׁירוּ־ <S%H7891><s%> Sing ל֭וֹ זַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> unto him sing psalms ל֑וֹ שִׂ֝֗יחוּ <S%H7878><s%> unto him talk בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6381><s%> ye of all his wondrous works

הִֽ֭תְהַלְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Glory בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> ye in his holy יִ֝שְׂמַ֗ח <S%H8055><s%> of them rejoice לֵ֤ב ׀ <S%H3820><s%> let the heart מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י <S%H1245><s%> that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
דִּרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1875><s%> Seek יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְעֻזּ֑וֹ <S%H5797><s%> and his strength בַּקְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H1245><s%> seek פָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> his face תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> evermore

זִכְר֗וּ <S%H2142><s%> Remember נִפְלְאוֹתָ֥יו <S%H6381><s%> his marvellous works אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> that he hath done מֹ֝פְתָ֗יו <S%H4159><s%> his wonders וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <S%H4941><s%> and the judgments פִֽיו׃ <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth

זֶ֭רַע <S%H2233><s%> O ye seed אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> ye children יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <S%H972><s%> his chosen

ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> He [is] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [are] in all the earth מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃ <S%H4941><s%> his judgments

זָכַ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> He hath remembered לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever בְּרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> his covenant דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> the word צִ֝וָּ֗ה <S%H6680><s%> [which] he commanded לְאֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּ֭רַת <S%H3772><s%> Which [covenant] he made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> with Abraham וּשְׁב֖וּעָת֣וֹ <S%H7621><s%> and his oath לְיִשְׂחָֽק׃ <S%H3446><s%> unto Isaac

וַיַּֽעֲמִידֶ֣הָ <S%H5975><s%> And confirmed לְיַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> the same unto Jacob לְחֹ֑ק <S%H2706><s%> for a law לְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> [and] to Israel בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [for] an everlasting

לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Saying לְךָ֗ אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> Unto thee will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan חֶ֝֗בֶל <S%H2256><s%> the lot נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> of your inheritance

בִּֽ֭הְיוֹתָם <S%H1961><s%> were only מְתֵ֣י <S%H4962><s%> When they were [but] a few men מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> in number כִּ֝מְעַ֗ט <S%H4592><s%> yea very few וְגָרִ֥ים <S%H1481><s%> and strangers בָּֽהּ׃

וַֽ֭יִּתְהַלְּכוּ <S%H1980><s%> When they went מִגּ֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> from one nation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גּ֑וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation מִ֝מַּמְלָכָ֗ה <S%H4467><s%> to another from [one] kingdom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> to another

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הִנִּ֣יחַ <S%H3240><s%> He suffered אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> no man לְעָשְׁקָ֑ם <S%H6231><s%> to do them wrong וַיּ֖וֹכַח <S%H3198><s%> yea he reproved עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> their sakes מְלָכִֽים׃ <S%H4428><s%> kings

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> no תִּגְּע֥וּ <S%H5060><s%> [Saying] Touch בִמְשִׁיחָ֑י <S%H4899><s%> not mine anointed וְ֝לִנְבִיאַי <S%H5030><s%> and do my prophets אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7489><s%> no harm

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> Moreover he called רָ֭עָב <S%H7458><s%> for a famine עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> the whole staff לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread שָׁבָֽר׃ <S%H7665><s%> he brake

שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> He sent לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> before אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man לְ֝עֶ֗בֶד <S%H5650><s%> for a servant נִמְכַּ֥ר <S%H4376><s%> [who] was sold יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> them [even] Joseph

עִנּ֣וּ <S%H6031><s%> they hurt בַכֶּ֣בֶל <S%H3525><s%> with fetters [רַגְלָיו כ] (רַגְלֹ֑ו <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure ק) בַּ֝רְזֶ֗ל <S%H1270><s%> in iron בָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> was laid נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> he

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> Until the time בֹּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> came דְבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> that his word אִמְרַ֖ת <S%H565><s%> the word יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְרָפָֽתְהוּ׃ <S%H6884><s%> tried

שָׁ֣לַח <S%H7971><s%> sent מֶ֭לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king וַיַּתִּירֵ֑הוּ <S%H5425><s%> and loosed מֹשֵׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> him [even] the ruler עַ֝מִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people וַֽיְפַתְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H6605><s%> and let him go free

שָׂמ֣וֹ <S%H7760><s%> He made אָד֣וֹן <S%H113><s%> him lord לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל <S%H4910><s%> and ruler בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קִנְיָנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7075><s%> of all his substance
לֶאְסֹ֣ר <S%H631><s%> To bind שָׂרָ֣יו <S%H8269><s%> his princes בְּנַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> at his pleasure וּזְקֵנָ֥יו <S%H2205><s%> and teach his senators יְחַכֵּֽם׃ <S%H2449><s%> wisdom

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> also came יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וְ֝יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob גָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> sojourned בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land חָֽם׃ <S%H2526><s%> of Ham

וַיֶּ֣פֶר <S%H6509><s%> And he increased אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֣וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly וַ֝יַּֽעֲצִמֵהוּ <S%H6105><s%> and made them stronger מִצָּרָֽיו׃ <S%H6862><s%> than their enemies

הָפַ֣ךְ <S%H2015><s%> He turned לִ֭בָּם <S%H3820><s%> their heart לִשְׂנֹ֣א <S%H8130><s%> to hate עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people לְ֝הִתְנַכֵּ֗ל <S%H5230><s%> to deal subtilly בַּעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> with his servants

שָׁ֭לַח <S%H7971><s%> He sent מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> [and] Aaron אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom בָּֽחַר־ <S%H977><s%> whom he had chosen בּֽוֹ׃

שָֽׂמוּ־ <S%H7760><s%> They shewed בָ֭ם דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> acts אֹתוֹתָ֑יו <S%H226><s%> his wondrous וּ֝מֹפְתִ֗ים <S%H4159><s%> among them and wonders בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חָֽם׃ <S%H2526><s%> of Ham

שָׁ֣לַֽח <S%H7971><s%> He sent חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> darkness וַיַּחְשִׁ֑ךְ <S%H2821><s%> and made it dark וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מָ֝ר֗וּ <S%H4784><s%> and they rebelled אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> against [דְּבָרָוו כ] (דְּבָרֹֽו׃ <S%H1697><s%> act ק)

הָפַ֣ךְ <S%H2015><s%> He turned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵימֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4325><s%> their waters לְדָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> into blood וַ֝יָּ֗מֶת <S%H4191><s%> and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּגָתָֽם׃ <S%H1710><s%> their fish
שָׁרַ֣ץ <S%H8317><s%> in abundance אַרְצָ֣ם <S%H776><s%> Their land צְפַרְדְּעִ֑ים <S%H6854><s%> frogs בְּ֝חַדְרֵ֗י <S%H2315><s%> in the chambers מַלְכֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4428><s%> of their kings

אָ֭מַר <S%H559><s%> He spake וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> and there came עָרֹ֑ב <S%H6157><s%> divers sorts of flies כִּ֝נִּ֗ים <S%H3654><s%> [and] lice בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <S%H1366><s%> in all their coasts
נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> He gave גִּשְׁמֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H1653><s%> for rain בָּרָ֑ד <S%H1259><s%> them hail אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire לֶהָב֣וֹת <S%H3852><s%> [and] flaming בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> in their land

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> He smote גַּ֭פְנָם <S%H1612><s%> their vines וּתְאֵנָתָ֑ם <S%H8384><s%> also and their fig trees וַ֝יְשַׁבֵּ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> and brake עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> the trees גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <S%H1366><s%> of their coasts

אָ֭מַר <S%H559><s%> He spake וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came אַרְבֶּ֑ה <S%H697><s%> and the locusts וְ֝יֶ֗לֶק <S%H3218><s%> and caterpillers וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> and that without number

וַיֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> And did eat up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> all the herbs בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> in their land וַ֝יֹּ֗אכַל <S%H398><s%> and devoured פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> the fruit אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <S%H127><s%> of their ground

וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> He smote כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> also all the firstborn בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> in their land רֵ֝אשִׁ֗ית <S%H7225><s%> the chief לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H202><s%> of all their strength

וַֽ֭יּוֹצִיאֵם <S%H3318><s%> He brought them forth בְּכֶ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> also with silver וְזָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> there בִּשְׁבָטָ֣יו <S%H7626><s%> [person] among their tribes כּוֹשֵֽׁל׃ <S%H3782><s%> and [there was] not one feeble

שָׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> was glad מִצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt בְּצֵאתָ֑ם <S%H3318><s%> when they departed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> of them נָפַ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> of them fell פַּחְדָּ֣ם <S%H6343><s%> for the fear עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

פָּרַ֣שׂ <S%H6566><s%> He spread עָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> a cloud לְמָסָ֑ךְ <S%H4539><s%> for a covering וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> and fire לְהָאִ֥יר <S%H215><s%> to give light לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> in the night

שָׁאַ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> [The people] asked וַיָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> and he brought שְׂלָ֑ו <S%H7958><s%> quails וְלֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> them with the bread שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽם׃ <S%H7646><s%> and satisfied

פָּ֣תַח <S%H6605><s%> He opened צ֭וּר <S%H6697><s%> the rock וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <S%H2100><s%> gushed out מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> and the waters הָ֝לְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> they ran בַּצִּיּ֥וֹת <S%H6723><s%> in the dry places נָהָֽר׃ <S%H5104><s%> [like] a river

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זָ֭כַר <S%H2142><s%> For he remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> promise קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> his holy אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> [and] Abraham עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5650><s%> his servant

וַיּוֹצִ֣א <S%H3318><s%> And he brought forth עַמּ֣וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people בְשָׂשׂ֑וֹן <S%H8342><s%> with joy בְּ֝רִנָּ֗ה <S%H7440><s%> with gladness אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <S%H972><s%> [and] his chosen

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> And gave לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> also אַרְצ֣וֹת <S%H776><s%> them the lands גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וַעֲמַ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> the labour לְאֻמִּ֣ים <S%H3816><s%> of the people יִירָֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> and they inherited

בַּעֲב֤וּר ׀ <S%H5668><s%> So יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> That they might observe חֻ֭קָּיו <S%H2706><s%> his statutes וְתוֹרֹתָ֥יו <S%H8451><s%> his laws יִנְצֹ֗רוּ <S%H5341><s%> and keep הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
